mainText:
The world has lost one of the greatest visionaries of all times. He inspired and changed the lives of billions of people, including myself. If there is one thing inside me, now that I know the news, it is deepest sadness.
I hope that he stays forever in the minds of all of us, who will always remain stunned by his brilliant ideas.

Thank you for being who you were, and who you will remain being inside all of us.
author: Patrick
